title: Process an Owner Contribution
description: A major repair (e.g., new roof) is needed that costs more than the property's reserve funds. The property manager must request a contribution from the owner.

tasks.description: Obtain multiple bids for the roof replacement and present them to the owner.
tasks.expected_outcome: The owner is presented with several quotes to choose from.

tasks.description: Formally request the necessary funds from the owner to cover the cost of the selected bid.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal request for an owner contribution is sent.

tasks.description: Receive the funds from the owner and record the contribution in the property's accounting ledger.
tasks.expected_outcome: The owner contribution is received and correctly recorded.
